fcs_function.name: accelerations/a_n
fcs_function.description:
Page 43: Calc of G-force.
I had some trouble using the Nz, but don't remember what it was.

fcs_function.name: accelerations/a_y
fcs_function.description:
Page 43: Calc of lateral G-force.
I had some trouble using the Ny.

kinematic.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/yaw/rudder-cmd-norm-kinematic
kinematic.description: Real pedals can not be moved as fast as a joystick. This will limit the movement speed.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/negative-g-limit-final
switch.description: The second test is for MPO switch enabled. Source: The Israeli document.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/g-limit-product
switch.description: The second test is for MPO switch enabled. Source: The Israeli document.

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/alpha-indicated-mpo
switch.description:
The test is for MPO switch enabled. Source: The Israeli document.
Should fake alpha be allowed through? (probably not, the pilot wants full control of elevator even when rolling)

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/main-gain
switch.description: Is 3.0 in tp1538, and 1.5 in the older control digram, which the YF16 uses. Since Erik made the elevator effects much larger due to block 5+ larger htail, it needs to be lower than 3 to avoid oscillation at high speed. So for now set to 2.0.

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-loop-ground-product
pure_gain.description: diagram say 0.5, but negative makes more sense

summer.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/int-balance-summer
summer.description: test system not made, so is 0

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lower-switch
switch.description: Is 1.0 or 10 in diagram, but does not make sense to me.

lag_filter.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lower-lag
lag_filter.description: diagram say 0.125, but that does a pitch up for too long after takeoff

switch.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/normal-1-special
switch.description: This prevents NaN to propagate through the system

second_order_filter.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/pitch-rate-lead-2nd
second_order_filter.description: on old diagram looks to be 2.5, not 2 nor 25

fcs_function.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/pitch/block15-horz-tail-factor
fcs_function.description: Block-15 and above had the horizontal tail surface enlarged by 25% for better control. This data does not factor that in so do it ourselves.

fcs_function.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/lef/lef-pos-r-norm
fcs_function.description: Inversed normalized LEF. Used in aero.

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/tef/tef-pos-norm
pure_gain.description: Using integrator output as mechanical bias should not be feed into aerodynamics

pure_gain.name: fcs/fly-by-wire/tef/tef-pos-deg-hud
pure_gain.description: This value should be displayed in HUD.
